name: Demo Knight
description:
Demo knight is a very small demo game made for the 2022 Juice Jam! It stars You in the role of Player 1 as you're about to complete your adventure. However, the dastardly wizard eyeAM has other plans! Now you must escape their dungeon and reclaim your freedom. 

BIG NOTE:

R - to restart on Death.

There's no visual indicator! I forgot to add the trigger. The subsequent tries are easier.

Controls:

WASD  - to move

L click - to charge up your sword swing

Escape - to quit the game

R - to restart on Death.

Acknowledgements and Influences

Right, so I'd feel really scummy if I didn't acknowledge this from the get go. EyeAM is based on Queen from Delta Rune, their sprite(s) are literally re-skinned. I'm not a professional character designer and by no means wish to claim the character as wholesale original.
